text: Is there a way to tell what pages a module is being used on?

Hi Matt,
Yes, there is a way.
You have to go to the design manager, then go to the module you want info → right click on it → show dependents.
Hope this helps!
Do you know if there is a way to change a field within a module from a text field to a rich text field?

It's not possible to change the type of an existing field, but you can replace it. To do this, you need to copy the HubL variable name from your text field, create a new rich text field, and then rename the HubL variable with the one from the text field.

If it doesn't work, you can always revert the change. It's also a good practice to duplicate the module and work with the duplicated version before pushing changes if your module is live and you don't want to affect the live pages.
